1.content: Ash gets turned into a pikachu again. https://d.facdn.net/art/pichu90/12064289... “Waaaaaa! I’m a pikachu again”! Ash says very scared and confused. Where is ash right now when he gets turned into a pikachu?
1.title: Catch them or be caught

choices: Ash continue to pretend, she is normal Pikachu. (Dawn decided catch the Pikachu)
Ash started freak, which cause ash speak like normal person.
Ash was shock to find out, and now one of Dawn Pokémon is fell in love with her.
Brock come back, and explain to Dawn that Female Pikachu is Ash.
12.content:
“Oh no, Ash you turn into Pikachu but how?” Brock asked while Ash Slowly calm down, and reply. “I not know myself, Brock but I hope that I change back soon.” Brock sigh. “Well for now, you shouldn’t talk like normal person, because then lot of people wanted to catch you!” As Ash reply. “Alright, I mean *Pikchua*” but after 1 hour, Ash play with his Pokémon, Brock Pokémon and Dawn Pokémon. “Ash I am going into forest to collect more berrys, you continue play and stay near our camp site, including act like Pikachu.” Brock said, and with that he leave, after few mins, Dawn come out her tent and saw cute and adorable wild Pikachu play with Ash’s, Brocks and her Pokémon’s! And she immediately pick up wild Pikachu. “You’re are such cute female Pikachu.” Dawn said with smile.

(How did Ash react, learning that he is female Pikachu?)
12.title: Sinnoh

choices: Yes, Dawn was very happy and soon train her pikachu
Brock come back and saw Dawn tried caught Ash, and explain Pikachu was Ash
121.content:
Ash was big shock, that he is female Pikachu but he or he say she, have to continue pretend to be normal Pikachu, as she reply. *Pika-chu* in happy tone. “Aww even your Pikachu sound are cute, well it settles It, I am going catch you.” Dawn said which cause Ash to immediately jump out of her arms, as she land on the ground, and about to run! When Dawn send out Piplup and said. “I choose you piplup.” And soon Ash was face to face with Piplup, and he didn’t know female Pikachu is Ash! “Piplup use tackle!” Dawn said and Piplup immediately tackle Female Pikachu. “Great now use bubble bean.” Ash immediately dodge Piplup bubble bean. “Piplup use peck.” Ash tried dodge it but Piplup got directed hit on her! “Great now time, to catch you.” Dawn said and pull out pokeball and then toss it at female Pikachu. Ash tried run but felt pokeball hit her, as she was suck inside!

(Doe Ash get caught?)
121.title: Ash continue to pretend, she is normal Pikachu....

1211.content:
Ash couldn’t believe that she was inside pokeball, but she felt pokeball shake three before she heard *Bing* sound which mean, Dawn successfully catch her! “OH NO NOW I AM STUCK AS DAWN POKÉMON!” Ash cried.

(Meanwhile outside)
Dawn was so happy she catch her own Pikachu and made more special, Pikachu is female. “Oh right, I catch Pikachu.” Dawn yelled in excited. “Now that I have female Pikachu what move should I train her to do?” Dawn asked herself.
1211.title: Yes, Dawn was very happy and soon train her pik...

choices: Ash alway win ever contest Dawn enter her in
Ash alway lost ever contest Dawn enter her in
12111.content:
“Oh I know I train her use Charm or Attract, but which one, Wait I know, I will train her use both move.” Dawn said with huge smile.

(After few weeks)
Ash soon learn the move Charm and Attract, and soon been enter contest with Dawn other Pokemons.

(Did Ash alway win contest or alway lost the contest?)
12111.title: Charm or Attract

choices: Yes, Dawn decided breed her female pikachu
No, Ash continue enter contest and win all of them!
121111.content:
Ash alway win contest, He didn’t know how, he keep win but alway he know is, Dawn is very happy to win contest!

(Did anything else happens?)
121111.title: Ash alway win ever contest Dawn enter her in

choices: Team Rocket come and capture Ash.
Wild Pokémon fell madly in love with Ash
His Pikachu desire to mate with Ash
124.content:
Brook come back, and saw Dawn was about catch Ash, as he yelled. “Wait Dawn that not normal female pikachu, that is Ash, he been turn into Pokémon!”

Dawn gasp and asked. “Wait Really this is Ash?” As Ash reply. “Yes it me, Brook told should sound more like Pikachu, so no one would tried catch me.” Dawn look at Ash. “Wow it really is you Ash.” She said and pick him up or pick her up.

(After few hours)
Ash play all the Pokémon’s, and he have lot fun.

(Doe anything happened?)
